Quiz_Questions.question: A ___________ refers to a single unit of values. E.g. Roll Number, Name, Date of Birth, Age etc.
Give 2 types of data items. Separate answer with comma

Data items that can be divided into sub-items are called ‘______ ______’. E.g. the name of a person is a group item because it can be divided into three sub-items: First Name, Middle Initial and Last Name. Other examples are: Address, Date, Qualification, Salary etc.

Data items that cannot be divided into sub-items are called ‘______ ______’. E.g. the roll number of a student is an elementary item because it cannot be divided further into sub-items. Other examples are: Marks, Age etc.

classification of data structure consists of Primitive data structure and Non-primitive data structure
